Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Well, I did not expect you to return this soon.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Seems even a simpleton like you can manage not to mess things up.

Choices.Choice2: Ensure that he can trust in your service

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: You can always trust in my service.

Speaker.name: Archibald_Normal
Speaker.line1: Enough rambling. Just put my meal down already.

Speaker.name: Waiter
Speaker.line1: [You serve the meal to Sir Archibald and start brewing the tea.]
